songs.title: You Need Me, I Don’t Need You (Loadstar Remix)
songs.album: You Need Me, I Don’t Need You (Remixes)
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Cause you need me, man, I don’t need you
You need me, man, I don’t need you
You need me, man, I don’t need you at all
You need me, man, I don’t need you
You need me, man, I don’t need you
You need me, man, I don’t need you
You need me, man, I don’t need you at all
You need me

[Breakdown]
Cause you need me, man, I don’t need you
You, you, you, you, you, you, you, you, you
You, you, you, you, you, you, you, you, you

[Chorus]
Cause you need me, man, I don’t need you
You need me, man, I don’t need you
You need me, man, I don’t need you at all
You need me, man, I don’t need you

[Breakdown]
Cause you need me, man, I don’t need you
You need me, man, I don’t need you
You need me, man, I don’t need you
Cause you need me, man, I don’t need you

[Chorus]
Cause you need me, man, I don’t need you
You need me, man, I don’t need you
You need me, man, I don’t need you at all
You need me

[Breakdown]
Cause you need me, man, I don’t need you
You, you, you, you, you, you, you, you, you
You, you, you, you, you, you, you, you, you

[Chorus]
Cause you need me, man, I don’t need you
You need me, man, I don’t need you
You need me, man, I don’t need you at all
You need me, man, I don’t need you

[Breakdown]
Cause you need me, man, I don’t need you
You need me, man, I don’t need you
You need me, man, I don’t need you
Cause you need me, man, I don’t need you
